## FFTWaveGenerator.setWaveCroppiness() method

Sets the wave croppiness for the specified cascade

**Signature:**

```typescript
setWaveCroppiness(cascade: number, croppiness: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cascade | number | The cascade index |
|  croppiness | number | The new wave croppiness for the specified cascade |

**Returns:**

void
